name: dflow
description: is a minimal Dataflow programming engine

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run svg && npm run jekyll; npm run git_add-f; git status
scripts.browserify: for x in dist editor examples; do npm run browserify_$x; done
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run docs:_data; cd docs; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in cli engine editor test; do npm run lint_$x; done
scripts.lint_cli: cd src/cli; standa --fix; standa --fix dflow; cd -
scripts.lint_test: cd test; standa --fix --global describe --global it; cd -
scripts.minify: cd dist; uglifyjs ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/dflow"'; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; git push origin master
scripts.svg: for x in apply hello-world indexOf loadScriptJS sum; do node src/examples/renderer/server-side.js $x; done
